name: EvolutionX
changelog: $LSMerged the latest December source.$LE$LSSwitched to FBEv2 encryption.$LE$LSEROFS build.$LE$LSFixed the FOD issue on payment apps and Applock.$LE$LSUpdated KernelSu to v0.7.1.$LE$LSAdded the MIUI camera (Note: Portrait mode broken).$LE$LSFixed the screen-off FOD by switching to AOD mode instead of waking the screen.$LE$LSPlay Protect certified by default$LE
notes: $LSClean Flash is Mandatory$LE$LSEROFS build$LE$LSThanks to ivecera for his contribution and assisting me with kernel_dimming, and kudos to kyryll for his valuable suggestions and ideas related to kernel_dimming
